parameter.label: test-label  //element label
parameter.srcLabel: test-srcLabel-     //must contain value if elementType is EDGE, support read from reader?
parameter.writeMode: INSERT, UPDATE(what to do when same id appears, append? rewrite?), SKIP       1)insert
parameter.idStrategy: 1)primaryKey (user specify properties to concatenate as primary key, then AT LEAST ONE id in column is required), 2)customize

column.name: id  //property name
column.value: {0},1}..., only string type are allowed to concatenate, e.g.,prefix-{0}-suffix
column.valueType: int, long, float, double, string, boolean
column.propertyType: vertexId, vertexProperty, edgeProperty, srcId, dstId (edge can have vertexPrimaryProperty if isStrategy is primaryKeys)// if not set, fill in V/E property according to elementType; At least 1 id column is required(pending
column.indexing: true:boolean/false   //default true, set false will disable global search for specific V/E
